label: Lima
description: Capital of Peru on the Pacific coast, major urban and political center.

label: Cusco
description: High-altitude city in the Andes, former capital of the Inca Empire.

label: Sacred Valley
description: Fertile valley of the Urubamba River with Inca sites and villages.

label: Machu Picchu Sanctuary
description: 15th-century Inca citadel on a mountain ridge above the Urubamba River.

label: Lake Titicaca
description: Large high-altitude lake on the Peru–Bolivia border with island settlements.

label: Arequipa
description: Southern city built from volcanic stone, near Misti and Chachani volcanoes.

label: Machu Picchu (Test at Home)
description: Developer test location in Virginia, used for debugging the app.

label: Choquequirao
description: Inca archaeological site on a ridge above the Apurímac River canyon.

label: Nazca Lines
description: Ancient geoglyphs in the desert depicting animals and geometric shapes.

label: Kuélap Fortress
description: Stone fortress built by the Chachapoya culture in northern cloud forest.

label: Chan Chan Ruins
description: Largest adobe city in the Americas, capital of the Chimú culture.

label: Chavín de Huántar
description: Ceremonial center of the Chavín culture with temples and carved stones.

label: Caral-Supe
description: One of the oldest cities in the Americas, with pyramids and plazas.

label: Sipán Tombs
description: Moche elite burials at Huaca Rajada, including the Lord of Sipán.

label: Manu National Park
description: Large rainforest reserve spanning Andes to Amazon with high biodiversity.

label: Paracas Reserve
description: Coastal desert and marine reserve protecting wildlife and landscapes.

label: Pacaya-Samiria Reserve
description: Amazon basin reserve of flooded forests and blackwater rivers.

label: Tumbes Mangroves
description: Northern coastal mangrove forest at the Tumbes River estuary.

label: Gocta Falls
description: Two-tiered waterfall in the Amazonas region, over 700 meters tall.

label: Rainbow Mountain
description: Mountain with striped mineral layers, known as Rainbow Mountain.

label: Huacachina Oasis
description: Small natural lagoon surrounded by large desert sand dunes.

label: Cordillera Huayhuash
description: Compact Andean mountain range with peaks over 6,000 meters.

label: Nor Yauyos-Cochas
description: Highland reserve with rivers, waterfalls, and glacial lakes.

label: Marcahuasi Plateau
description: High plateau near Lima with granite rock formations shaped by erosion.

label: Pampa Galeras
description: Highland reserve protecting vicuñas and Andean grassland habitat.

label: Oxapampa Cloud Forest
description: Cloud forest zone in central Peru with high biodiversity.

label: Huascarán National Park
description: Cordillera Blanca reserve with Peru’s highest peak and glacial lakes.

label: Huayllay Stone Forest
description: Eroded volcanic stone formations resembling a forest of pillars.

label: Q'eswachaka Inca Bridge
description: Traditional Inca rope bridge rebuilt annually with woven grass.

label: Cotahuasi Canyon
description: Deep canyon in southern Peru, over 3,500 meters from rim to river.

label: Rúpac Ruins
description: Hilltop stone citadel ruins of the Atavillos culture near Lima.

label: Bosque de Pómac
description: Dry forest with pyramids of the Sicán culture in northern Peru.

label: Tres Cañones
description: Convergence of three deep Andean canyons in Cusco region.

label: Cañón de los Perdidos
description: Remote desert canyon with layered walls in the Ica region.

label: Puno
description: City on the shore of Lake Titicaca, gateway to island communities.

label: Colca Canyon
description: Andean canyon twice the depth of the Grand Canyon, with condors.

label: Puerto Maldonado
description: Amazon port city in Madre de Dios, gateway to Tambopata region.

label: Hoja Nueva
description: Research station in Tambopata rainforest for biodiversity studies.
